oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Talking over crime situation, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A captioned photo from the Nashville Times (1940), about Chief of Police John Griffin. The caption reads: “Chief of Police John Griffin and James Merritt Hepbron, well known criminologist, discussed local crime problems in the chief’s office this morning. Hepbron will speak at Vanderbilt tonight.” Hepbron was the Director of the Baltimore Criminal Justice Commission. Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Police chiefs--Tennessee--Nashville; Criminologists--Maryland--Baltimore
